alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:37PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mobile and northwestern Baldwin Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 235 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Creola. This storm was moving very slowly to the northeast at around 5 mph. Other storms extend northeast of this storm into northern Baldwin county, also moving slowly northeast. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saraland, Satsuma, Creola, Stockton, Axis and I65 And AL 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
